body.p: Oxygen Feedback search engine supports labels and label search. This topic describes the process of collecting labels and what should you do in order to use this feature on your websites.

section.title: Labelling Topics
section.p:
In order to user label search a topic must have a generated label that follows this structure:
Annual Plant

A label must have a span tag which will store label's name. Besides label's title it must have a a tag with href set to search page with searchQuery parameter that follows this structure: label:label_name.
